thread.title: BRIEF-Zebra Technologies Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07

title: BRIEF-Zebra Technologies Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07
text: February 22, 2018 / 12:01 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Zebra Technologies Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.07 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Zebra Technologies Corp: * ZEBRA TECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.33 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 SALES $1.03 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.95 TO $2.15 * SEES FY 2018 SALES UP ABOUT 4 TO 7 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 SALES UP ABOUT 7 TO 10 PERCENT * ZEBRA TECHNOLOGIES - ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS TO GENERATE FREE CASH FLOW OF AT LEAST $475 MILLION AND CONTINUE TO REDUCE FINANCIAL LEVERAGE​ * ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF 19% TO 20% FOR FULL YEAR 2018​ * ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF 18.5% TO 19.0% FOR Q1 2018​ * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.63, REVENUE VIEW $895.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $3.80 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.12, REVENUE VIEW $984.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
